title: FFuF
snippet: Just my notes on how to use FFuF. The writeup and the video differ slightly as I learned a few more things after I had initially rooted the machine. Encrypting the root flag so that NT Authority\System couldn’t read it ...

snippet: Devel, not to be confused with Devil, is another beginner box that we will exploit with Metasploit and via a script, plus throw in a bit of Powershell ‘cuz I need the practice. There is anonymous FTP access to the webroot, which, while highly unlikely in the real world, is pretty much game over.E...

title: Buffer Overflow Demo

title: WiFi PMKID Capture
snippet: Even in 2020 it is still easy to steal WiFi credentials. The video at the bottom is almost entirely in real time. With a 10,000 word long wordlist, it took far longer to write these notes than it did to pwn my friend’s wifi.The password has now been changed, so if you’re gonna track me down just ...
